author: hwright
msg: Fix some sqlite database lifetime issues.  The databases are closed on
pool cleanup, so be a bit more aggressive about pool management.
(svn_wc__entry_remove): Create a subpool for the database handle.

author: gstein
msg: Switch order of status/kind parameters in svn_wc__db_base_get_info() to
align with db_read_info(). Since it is arbitrary, we're saying that STATUS
has more relevance than KIND, so it comes first.
(read_entries): change param order in call to db_base_get_info()
(test_getting_info): change param order in call to db_base_get_info()
(validate_node): change param order in call to db_base_get_info()

author: rhuijben
msg: * STATUS: Add r36050-r36051, r36131 to r36049 group

author: gstein
msg: Also, add a symlink's target to this function's set of OUT parameters, and
add a similar OUT param to svn_wc__db_base_get_info(). The two functions
which returned the target separately have been removed.
(enum statement_keys, statements): add statements to query the WORKING_NODE
(svn_wc__db_base_get_info): use get_translated_size helper, and return a
symlink's target in the OUT parameter.
(svn_wc__db_read_info): add TARGET parameter. implement the function.
(data_loading_sql): add a symlink to BASE. add rows in WORKING_NODE and
(test_getting_info): add new TARGET param to all get_info() calls. test
fetching of the value for the new symlink at "H".
(test_working_info): basic function to test svn_wc__db_read_info. this
(enum statement_keys, statements): remove two unused statements
(read_entries): add a NULL TARGET parameter to the get_info call.
